alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 11:57AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1157 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sawgrass Mills Mall, or over Sunrise, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Margate, Lauderhill, Weston, North Lauderdale, Parkland, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Godfrey Road, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Markham Park, and Ramblewood East. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County
